bioconda.name: pipmir
bioconda.license: PIPmiR is provided for academic use only, if you wish to use it in another setting please contact Uwe Ohler.
bioconda.summary: We developed the PIPmiR algorithm to identify novel plant miRNA genes from a combination of deep sequencing data and genomic features.

biocontainers.name: pipmir
biocontainers.summary: We developed the PIPmiR algorithm to identify novel plant miRNA

biotools.summary: Algorithm to identify novel plant miRNA genes from a combination of deep sequencing data and genomic features.

bioschemas.name: PIPmiR
bioschemas.summary: Algorithm to identify novel plant miRNA genes from a combination of deep sequencing data and genomic features.
